item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。CPI日终于到来，交易员们看涨情绪高涨。与此同时，最新一轮的 "备忘录股票 "狂热仍在继续，铜世界也在酝酿一个大事件。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. CPI day is finally here and traders are in a bullish mood. Meanwhile, the latest round of meme-stock mania continues and a big story is brewing in the world of copper. Here’s what traders are talking about. — David Goodman】

item.title: 摩根大通杰米-戴蒙呼吁与中国 "全面接触
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）呼吁，尽管中国对西方构成了 "严峻的竞争"，但仍应与中国进行充分和深思熟虑的接触。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. Chief Executive Officer Jamie Dimon called for full and thoughtful engagement with China, despite the country posing “tough competition” for the West.】

item.title: 卡塔尔称 2030 年后将需要新的全球液化天然气项目
item.description: 卡塔尔能源部长表示，对天然气的需求将持续增长，2030 年之后全球将需要更多的供应项目。【原文：Demand for natural gas will keep growing and more supply projects will be required globally beyond 2030, Qatar’s energy minister said.】

item.title: 必和必拓股东认为盎格鲁集团的出价还有提高的空间
item.description: 必和必拓集团（BHP Group Ltd.）和收购目标英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）的股东预计，这家全球最大的矿业公司将在下周监管截止日期前提出第三份改进方案，即使这家规模较小的公司周二提出了自己大胆的重组计划。【原文：Shareholders in BHP Group Ltd. and takeover target Anglo American Plc expect the world’s largest miner to come back with a third and improved proposal before a regulatory deadline next week, even after the smaller company laid out a bold restructuring plan of its own on Tuesday.】

item.title: 德国联邦银行放弃新建办公室计划，坚持远程办公
item.description: 德国联邦银行放弃了在法兰克福总部增建新办公楼的计划，因为员工可以利用其在家办公的政策。【原文：Germany’s Bundesbank abandoned plans to add new office buildings to its Frankfurt headquarters as employees avail of its policy to work from home.】

item.title: 欧盟农作物贸易数据数周缺失，引发需求问题
item.description: 由于技术问题持续存在，欧盟的谷物出口数据自 3 月下旬以来一直缺失，在小麦价格飙升的同时，也掩盖了需求的步伐。【原文：The European Union’s grains export data has been missing since late March as technical issues persist, obscuring the pace of demand just as wheat prices soar.】

item.title: 欧盟称欧元区软着陆步入正轨但赤字扩大
item.description: 据欧盟委员会称，欧元区经济仍将实现软着陆，通胀回落速度将快于此前预期，经济增长将在明年回升。【原文：The euro-area economy is still headed for a soft landing, with inflation backpedaling more quickly than previously expected and growth picking up through next year, according to the European Commission.】

item.title: 欧盟认为意大利的财政状况比梅洛尼预计的要糟糕得多
item.description: 根据欧盟的预测，意大利明年将面临赤字扩大和债务激增的局面，这与意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）政府的乐观前景明显不符。【原文：Italy now faces a widening deficit and a jump in debt next year, according to European Union forecasts that conflict markedly with the rosier outlook of Premier Giorgia Meloni’s government.】

item.title: F1 大亨前妻建立家族办公室管理离婚财富
item.description: 一级方程式赛车亿万富翁伯尼-埃克尔斯通（Bernie Ecclestone）的前妻成立了一家公司，管理她从世界上最大的赛车运动品牌之一获得的财富，成为最新一位加强财富控制的超级富婆。【原文：The ex-wife of Formula One billionaire Bernie Ecclestone has built a firm to manage the fortune she derived from one of the world’s biggest motor-sports brands, becoming the latest super-rich woman to take more control of her wealth.】

item.title: 非洲金融公司将为非洲基础设施计划筹资近 10 亿美元
item.description: 非洲金融公司希望在 2024 年上半年筹集近 10 亿美元，用于支持工业和抵御气候变化，为非洲大陆的下一个增长阶段做好准备。【原文：Africa Finance Corp. is looking to raise almost $1 billion in the first half of 2024 to support industries and resilience against climate change as it readies for the next growth phase across the continent.】

item.title: 瑞士软化中立以出口武器，但不会帮助乌克兰
item.description: 瑞士政府希望能够避开本国僵硬的中立立场，允许更多的武器出口，但将继续阻止向乌克兰运送武器。【原文：The Swiss government wants to be able to sidestep the country’s rigid neutrality to allow more arms exports but will keep stopping weapon shipments to Ukraine.】

item.title: 印度贸易赤字因黄金进口支出增加而扩大
item.description: 由于黄金进口支出的增加，印度 4 月份的贸易赤字扩大至四个月来的最高点。【原文：India’s trade deficit widened to a four-month high in April due to a rise in gold import bill.】

item.title: 瑞典央行官员淡化通胀超调担忧
item.description: 瑞典央行官员表示，他们并不担心瑞典的通胀率会低于目标值，此前发布的一系列数据显示，物价上涨的速度比预期的要快。【原文：Riksbank officials signaled that they are not concerned about inflation in Sweden falling below its target after a string of releases showing that price increases are moderating at a faster pace than expected.】

item.title: 爱尔兰银行将停止在英国的企业贷款
item.description: 爱尔兰银行集团公司（Bank of Ireland Group Plc）将关闭其在英国的企业贷款部门，理由有很多，其中包括在英国产生长期可持续回报的能力。【原文：Bank of Ireland Group Plc is to wind down its corporate lending arm in Great Britain, citing a range of reasons, including the ability to generate long-term sustainable returns there.】

item.title: GameStop 和 AMC 大涨，Meme 股票涨势延续至第三天
item.description: 周三，围绕高风险和严重做空公司的狂热情绪再度升温，推动 "记忆股 "宠儿 GameStop 公司和 AMC Entertainment Holdings 公司连续第三个交易日走高。【原文：The renewed frenzy surrounding high-risk and heavily shorted companies is propelling meme-stock favorites GameStop Corp. and AMC Entertainment Holdings Inc. higher Wednesday for a third consecutive session.】

item.title: Rystad 预测今夏汽油需求将突破 2019 年水平
item.description: Rystad Energy A/S表示，尽管近期市场出现疲软迹象，但今年夏天全球汽油需求仍将保持强劲。【原文：Global gasoline demand will remain robust this summer despite recent signs of weakness in the market, according to Rystad Energy A/S, which expects consumption to top levels seen before the pandemic in 2019.】

item.title: 国际能源署称出口降至 5 个月低点，俄罗斯石油收入受到打击
item.description: 据国际能源机构（International Energy Agency）称，在乌克兰无人机袭击和减产计划的影响下，俄罗斯 4 月份的原油和石油产品出口量降至 2023 年底的水平，给该国的石油收入带来了压力。【原文：Russia’s April exports of crude and petroleum products dropped to levels last seen in late-2023 amid Ukrainian drone attacks and planned output cuts, putting pressure on the nation’s oil revenues, according to the International Energy Agency.】

item.title: 国际能源署称全球石油需求增长前景继续疲软
item.description: 国际能源机构表示，在经济放缓和欧洲温和天气的影响下，今年全球石油需求增长前景继续疲软。【原文：The outlook for global oil demand growth this year continues to soften amid an economic slowdown and mild weather in Europe, the International Energy Agency said.】

item.title: 印尼下一任领导人的目标是实现高于世界水平的 8%增长
item.description: 当选总统普拉博沃-苏比安托坚信，他将通过专注于工业化以及食品和能源安全，帮助印尼在任期初期赢得世界经济增长最快国家的称号。【原文：President-elect Prabowo Subianto is confident that he will be able to help Indonesia win the world’s fastest-growing economy tag early in his term, by focusing on industrialization and food and energy security.】

item.title: 在沙特阿拉伯开店的迪拜咨询公司对外国直接投资持乐观态度
item.description: 据精品公司 deNovo Corporate Advisors 称，沙特阿拉伯开始吸引更多外国直接投资以支持王储穆罕默德-本-萨勒曼的经济多元化努力只是时间问题。【原文：It’s only a matter of time before Saudi Arabia starts attracting more foreign direct investment to support Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman’s economic diversification drive, according to boutique firm deNovo Corporate Advisors.】

item.title: 印度尼西亚 APRIL 集团通过收购 Origami 进入印度市场
item.description: 印度尼西亚的亚太资源国际有限公司（Asia Pacific Resources International Ltd.集团表示，它收购了印度卫生纸制造商 Origami Cellulo Pvt.【原文：Indonesia’s Asia Pacific Resources International Ltd. Group said it bought a controlling stake in Indian tissue paper manufacturer Origami Cellulo Pvt., marking the pulp maker’s entry into the South Asian country.】

item.title: 7 亿美元的收购交易为印度的流动性指明了新方向
item.description: 私募股权基金向投资者返还利润的新方法可能会在印度受到欢迎。【原文：A new method for private equity funds to return profits to investors may gain traction in India.】

item.title: 高盛称韩国距离加入主要债券指数越来越近
item.description: 据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：South Korea will likely enter a key global bond index in September if it achieves a breakthrough in expanding foreign investors’ access to its government debt next month, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 维勒鲁瓦称欧洲央行极有可能在 6 月开始降息
item.description: 法国央行行长弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，欧洲央行很有可能在 6 月份举行的下一次政策会议上开始降息。【原文：The European Central Bank is very likely to start cutting interest rates at its next policy meeting in June, Bank of France Governor Francois Villeroy de Galhau said.】

item.title: 由于对民调的担忧，2012 年以来外资看空印度股票的人数最多
item.description: 由于市场猜测印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）领导的政党在正在举行的全国大选中赢得的席位将少于此前的预期，外国投资者对印度股市的看法是十多年来最悲观的。【原文：Foreign investors are the most pessimistic in over a decade on Indian stocks amid speculation over Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s party winning fewer seats in the ongoing national elections than previously estimated.】

item.title: Avendus Wealth 聘用安信银行私人银行主管担任首席执行官
item.description: Avendus 集团任命资深私人银行家 Apurva Sahijwani 为其财富管理业务的新任首席执行官，以扩大对家族办公室和印度富人的服务。【原文：Avendus Group named veteran private banker Apurva Sahijwani as the new chief executive officer for its wealth management business as it expands services for family offices and India’s wealthy.】

item.title: 瑞典通胀支持瑞典央行减轻物价压力
item.description: 瑞典上个月的基本通胀率保持不变，这对瑞典央行来说是一个令人欣慰的迹象，上周，瑞典央行成为第二家降息的发达国家主要央行。【原文：Sweden’s underlying inflation remained unchanged last month in a vindicating sign for the Riksbank, which last week became the second major developed-world central bank to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：指数将再创新高
item.description: 伦敦城。摄影师：Mike Kemp/Getty Images【原文：The City of London. Photographer: Mike Kemp/Getty Images】

item.title: 安联集团利润增长，Pimco 客户增加 320 亿欧元
item.description: 安联集团（Allianz SE）第一季度利润增长 6.8%，原因是非寿险理赔率低，以及其债券管理公司太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Allianz SE reported 6.8% higher profit for the first quarter amid low claims from non-life insurance and inflows at its bond manager Pacific Investment Management Co.】

item.title: 经济学家警告称，澳大利亚财政预算增长可能导致澳大利亚央行更加鹰派
item.description: 经济学家们表示，尽管周二的预算案预测通胀率将在年底前回落至2-3%的目标范围内，但澳大利亚央行很可能会在更长时间内维持利率高位，而这一结果通常会为更早的宽松政策敞开大门。【原文：Australia’s central bank is likely to keep interest rates elevated for longer, economists said, despite Tuesday’s budget forecasting inflation to fall back within the 2-3% target by year’s end, a result that would normally open the door to earlier easing.】
